function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Construction projects delayed or temporarily stopped due to budget cuts and income decrease","Impact":"Project delays and cancellation of contracts, amounting to billions of dollars","Mitigation":"Explore alternative funding sources, prioritize essential projects, revise budget allocations","Technologies":"Financial planning and budgeting software, project management tools","People":"Construction workers, project managers, government authorities","Owner":"Government authorities, project managers, financial planners"},{"Description":"Slowdown in project planning, design activities, inspections, and maintenance due to social distancing","Impact":"Reduction in construction productivity and worker efficiency, negative impact on project schedule and budget","Mitigation":"Implement remote project planning and design tools, automate inspections and maintenance processes, adopt flexible work schedules","Technologies":"Remote collaboration tools, automation software, time tracking and scheduling tools","People":"Construction workers, project planners, inspectors, maintenance staff","Owner":"Construction companies, project managers, technology providers"},{"Description":"Drastic decline in traffic and personal travel patterns in metropolitan cities","Impact":"Decrease in revenue from transportation-related fees and taxes, impact on infrastructure maintenance and development","Mitigation":"Diversify revenue sources, invest in sustainable infrastructure, implement smart city technologies","Technologies":"Traffic monitoring systems, smart transportation infrastructure, urban planning software","People":"City authorities, transportation agencies, urban planners","Owner":"City authorities, transportation agencies, urban planners"}]}
